title: Preexisting time share units and plans
context: [ยง514E-14] Preexisting time share units and plans. Time share units and time share plans for existing units which were created in a project prior to June 29, 1980, shall, within six months after June 29, 1980, comply with this chapter, except as to section 514E-5. [L 1980, c 186, pt of ยง1] Revision Note &ldquo;June 29, 1980&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this Act&rdquo; and &ldquo;the effective date&rdquo;.
